description: Euclid-Mullin sequence (A000945) with initial value a(1)=5 instead of a(1)=2.
comments: The initial primes 3 and 7 give essentially A000945.
example: 5*2*11*3 + 1 = 331, which is prime; the least prime factor of 330*331 + 1 = 109231 = 19*5749 is 19, so a(6) = 19.
mathematica: a[1]=5; a[n_] := First[ Flatten[ FactorInteger[ 1+Product[ a[ j ], {j, 1, n-1} ] ] ] ]; Array[a, 10]
author: _Labos Elemer_
